attributes.action: No to compulsory vaccination of Care home staff, with covid 19 vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
Forbid Forced Vaccination upon members of the uk population especially against trial medications.
Stop employers forcing staff to under go vaccination against there wishes.
Retain our Human rights of choice
Keep our democracy
attributes.background:
Nuremberg Charter strictly forbids medical experimentation on the population, forbidding being forced or coerced into vaccination.
Equality Act 2010 also protects against discrimination for those who cannot have the vaccine.
We must keep our human rights

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
